description: Punish players who log out while in Combat.

permissions.description: Allows one to bypass all of CombatLog's log prevention methods.
permissions.name: combatlog.bypass

permissions.description: Allows one to reload the configuration file's options.
permissions.name: combatlog.reload

permissions.description: Allows to one to unban CombatLoggers.
permissions.name: combatlog.unban

permissions.description: Allows one to see UpdateChecks upon logging in.
permissions.name: combatlog.updatecheck
